task.name: khandaker_1_medicalhistory
task.string: Please indicate if you have ever had (or still have) any of the conditions below and provide details of their occurrence.
Comment – details of disorder(s), if any
Cancer, leukaemia, Hodgkin’s disease, lymphoma, or melanoma
Stroke, brain haemorrhage, transient ischaemic attack (TIA), head injury causing loss of consciousness, or brain tumour
Multiple sclerosis, Parkinson’s disease, Alzheimer’s disease or dementia
Cerebral palsy or other brain disorders
Blindness, blurred or disturbed vision, not fully corrected by glasses or contact lenses; e.g. optic neuritis or glaucoma
Heart disorder, including heart attack, angina, cardiomyopathy, or heart murmur
Asthma, bronchitis, or chronic obstructive airways disease
Disorder of the digestive system, liver, stomach, pancreas or bowel, including ulcers, hepatitis, colitis or Crohn’s disease, irritable bowel disease, ulcerative colitis
Rheumatoid arthritis, osteoarthritis, psoriasis, lupus (SLE), other inflammatory disease
Arthritis, or any muscle, bone or joint disorder, e.g. sciatica, back, neck, shoulder or knee pain, repetitive strain injury (RSI), or gout
Any kidney, bladder or other genito-urinary disorder, including blood or protein in the urine, kidney cysts, or multiple urinary tract infections
Any serious skin disorder or allergy, including psoriasis
Diabetes or sugar in the urine
Thyroid problems or other endocrine disorders
Colds and flu, recent injuries, TB, HIV, other chronic or current infections
